# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(string LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(string "")
set_target_properties(string PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "string")
set_target_properties(string PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(string PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_definitions(string PRIVATE
    DOCTEST_CONFIG_IMPLEMENT_WITH_MAIN
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(string PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(string PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET string PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(string PRIVATE
    src/string.cpp
)
